additional_info:
*** ABOUT THIS EXAMPLE: This is an example of a Fermi GBM ALERT GCN notice. Only stricly necessary fields are present. Omitted fields have implied constant values in this notice type (see 'alert.full.example.json'). This 'about' note is not going to be part of streamed/real notices. This field, 'additional_info', may be empty or missing alltogether in case of no comments. An example of a typical notice comment follows. ***

Lightcurve and other quicklook files will not be created until about 15 minutes after the trigger.
